caption.title: Recombination inferred by high SNP density in 131 S. Typhimurium strains.
caption.p: Regions of high SNP density (red) are indicated for each of the 131 isolates in the S. Typhimurium ST19 cluster with reference to the S. Typhimurium strain SL1344 genome. Recombination is shown with reference to the population structure and phylogeny of Typhimurium shown in Fig 1. The position of predicted prophage (blue) in the S. Typhimurium strain SL1344 genome are indicated (top).
